hooks.command: filepath=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '(UserPrefValues\.(cpp|hpp)|UserStateValues\.(cpp|hpp)|UserPrefsAccessor[^/]*\.(java|properties)|UserStateAccessor[^/]*\.(java|properties)|SessionUserPrefValues\.R)$'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Auto-generated by scripts/generate-prefs.R. Edit the schema in src/cpp/session/resources/schema/ instead, then run: Rscript scripts/generate-prefs.R' >&2; exit 2; fi; if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE 'Options\.gen\.hpp$'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Auto-generated by scripts/generate-options.R. Edit server-options.json or session-options.json instead, then run: Rscript scripts/generate-options.R' >&2; exit 2; fi; if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '(CmdConstants[^/]*\.(java|properties)|MenuConstants[^/]*\.(java|properties)|Commands\.cmd\.xml\.MD5)$'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Auto-generated during GWT build. Edit Commands.cmd.xml instead, then build with: cd src/gwt && ant draft' >&2; exit 2; fi
